=============================================
Sim Science Test Monorepo - Public Health
=============================================

The public health package provides specialized functionality for public health simulations and analysis.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   installation
   api_reference/index

Installation
============

Install the public health package using pip:

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install sim-sci-test-monorepo-public-health

Quick Start
===========

.. code-block:: python

   from sim_sci_test_monorepo.public_health import models
   
   # Use public health functionality
   model = models.ExampleModel()
